page.title: 06Rural Artist
page.content: We live at Johnstonebridge, near the school. My mum and dad are artists. My mum prefers to paint landscapes, and my dad lectures at the Technical College in Dumfries. He prefers to paint still life and portraits. My mum has exhibited in Paris, Edinburgh, Carlisle and Dumfries. My dad does not exhibit his work very much but sometimes he puts some paintings or drawings in along with my mum. We keep a goat and two geese. We have two dogs, three cats, three kittens and a lamb.We usually buy a pig or two, and when they are heavy enough, we take them to Smiths, the butchers in Lockerbie. In the summer my dad holds a painting class at a hotel in Beattock and I pose for him.
